specsKey: Nikon Coolpix S02 Point & Shoot Camera
2 years Nikon India Warranty and Free Transit Insurance.
Touchscreen TFT LCD with Anti-reflection Coating

Motion Blur Reduction, Construction: 6 Elements in 5 Groups, 14.17 Million Total Pixels, Focus-area Selection (Center, Face Priority, Manual), 96% Frame Coverage (Shooting), 100% Frame Coverage (Playback), 7.3 GB Internal Memory, Exposure Control (Programmed Auto with Exposure Compensation (2 EV in ...View More
Motion Blur Reduction, Construction: 6 Elements in 5 Groups, 14.17 Million Total Pixels, Focus-area Selection (Center, Face Priority, Manual), 96% Frame Coverage (Shooting), 100% Frame Coverage (Playback), 7.3 GB Internal Memory, Exposure Control (Programmed Auto with Exposure Compensation (2 EV in increment of 1/3 EV), Mechanical and CMOS Electronic Shutter, Temperature: 0° C - 40° C, Humidity: 85% (No Condensation), Focus range: 30 cm (W) - 50 cm (T), Monitor: 6.7 cm Touchscreen TFT LCD with Anti-reflection Coating, Shooting Modes (Scene Auto Selector, Hand-held Night Scene, Backlit Scene HDR), Movie Frame Size: 1920 x 1080 (30p, 16:9, Default Setting), 1280 x 720 (30p, 16:9), iFrame 960 x 540 (30p, 16:9), HS 720/2x: 1280 x 720 (16:9), HS 1080/0.5x: 1920 x 1080 (16:9), Aperture: Electronically Selected Neutral Density (ND) Filter (-2 AV), Range: 2 Positions (F/3.3 and F/6.6 (W)), Data Transfer Protocol (MTP, PTP), Built-in Rechargeable Li-ion Battery, Still Pictures: 210 (with Built-in Battery), 1 hr 15 min Movie Recording (Actual Battery Life for Recording)
